DOC.brief_summary: to test safety and efficacy on metabolism, heart rate, blood pressure, TSH (and other blood)and hunger/caloric compensation on ephedra versus placebo
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Herbal Products on Metabolism and Hunger
DOC.criteria: age 1850, nonsmoking, not pregnant (serum), Beck <15, physician permission pregnant, lactating, smoker, use of appetiteaffecting medications
